name: Apanatva Sansthan
briefDescription: Apanatva Sansthan was founded in the year 2009 to contribute to the protection of Indian Culture, to enhance the Education in India, and to make overall growth of Indians. We also alleviate suffering out of respect for human dignity. Apanatva brings care to people in precarious situations and works towards helping them regain control over their future.Issues of Interest:Education (Education to those who can't afford it)Worsening status of womenPre-birth deaths of girl childrenDalit equityChildren deprived of educationStreet childrenDrought and chronic hungerRights of persons with disabilitiesDiscrimination and exploitation of vulnerable groups like the Commercial sex workersTribals and the homelessChild rightsFood rightsUrban
